fields.summary: Connect New Bitbucket Source to Bamboo
fields.description:
New source code in Bitbucket Datacenter needs to be connected to Bamboo.

The new source code repos include bamboo-specs.

Please connect:
* %APPSOURCE%
* %CBSOURCE%

Please ensure the policyfile policy_ews_%APP_NAME%.rb has deployed to the Chef server for policy group Dev.


This was created by %BUILD_RESULTS_URL%.
